name: Game Dev Simulator (Eravex)
description:
Game Dev Simulator is just as it sounds. 

  • Develop game concepts, markets and release your games.  
  • Make Money && earn skill points to help make more complex games. 
  • Search the News Feeds and discord for tips to help your game go viral.(Coming in the next day or so)
  • Hire teammates or buy assets from the store to help boost your skill.(Coming in the next day or so)

This is an early Version of the game.  Its a full game loop. its just missing the side panel functionality. such as games can go viral, the news feed just doesn't provide tips yet as to what's viral currently.  Pretty much the same with Hiring a freelance/ buying assets, its all there it just needs testing before its enabled for everyone. 

Its only been 4 days since it was started  so it'll get there shortly.
